enb_long_title: Fortieth session of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC-40)
sentences: During these meetings (23-26 September 2013, Stockholm, Sweden), WGI finalized its AR5 contribution titled 'Climate Change 2013: The Physical Science Basis'.
The Panel then met to approve the WGI SPM and also accepted the underlying report, including the Technical Summary and annexes.
